name: The Bad Dungeon (Alpha)
description:
A Dungeon "Crawler" i made out of an Unity Microgame.

It Offers:

  • Random Map selection
  • Random Enemy selection
  • Random Loot selection
  • Random Boss selection

I will add:

  • More Maps
  • More Weapons
  • More Bosses
  • Different Weapon Models
  • Bug Fixes Improvements
  • More cool stuff

The Game is currently in Alpha. The game probably gets released for free when entering a further development phase.

How to get Tester:

  • Buy The Alpha
  • Get a Download Key [Recommended]
